name: Digital Natives Group
tag_list: digital, advertising, social-media, facebook, twitter, linkedin, mobile, applications, mobile-apps, consulting, training, content-management
overview:
Digital Natives Group is a full-service social media agency owned and operated by a couple of recent energetic college grads.

At Digital Natives we are, well, digital natives. We love our moms and pops, but we also squirm when we see them adjusting to the lives of digital immigrants. We squirm even more when we see some otherwise awesome companies, both big and small, look like our parents using Facebook. So, we’re here to help. (Just please don’t ask us to fix any printers.) Our goal: to provide you with native insights that will help companies thrive in the brave new digital world.

Our largest area of business is our work as a full-service digital agency. We develop concepts, shape them into strategies, and then break them down and execute each tactic with professional attention to detail. We’re both an agency resource for full-spectrum advertising firms looking for help in the digital space, and an independent provider of strategy and implementations directly for our clients.

Not every business is looking for a huge campaign or mobile development, and we know that. For the small business owner who is great at what she does, but doesn’t have time to master the tools of social media, we are here to help. Our popular Digital Immigration program is designed to empower small and medium size businesses to make the most out of the social web. With our friendly and straightforward consulting, any small business can be a social superstar.
